Headline: Temporary Southbound Reroute near Woodlawn/55th
ShortDescription: Southbound 172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 buses are temporarily rerouted via Hyde Park, Woodlawn, 55th, Ellis and resume their regular route due to construction.

Northbound #172 buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th/75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Dorchester
ShortDescription: #75 74th/75th buses are temp rerouted in both directions via 75th, Stony Island, 76th & South Chicago, due to fire department activity near 75th/Dorchester.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th/75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, South Chicago and 75th, then resume their normal route, due to  fire department activity near 75th/Dorchester.

Allow extra travel time.
